}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "MADE IN CHINA" and "P/N:141420110000J REV:01" is silkscreened on a production model board. :"MADE IN TAIWAN" and "P/N:141420110000J REV:01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device is using ISL3886PIK.
SMC Part No. 99-012084-285, Sub. Assy. Part No. 91-012084-285
